//   row_major float4x4 glstate_matrix_mvp;

//   ------------------ ----- ----

//   _FlareTexture_ST   c4       1
//

    vs_3_0 // Converted from vs_2_0 with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_color v1
    dcl_texcoord v2

dcl_texcoord o0
dcl_position o1
dcl_color o2

    dp4 o1.x, c0, v0
    dp4 o1.y, c1, v0
    dp4 o1.z, c2, v0
    dp4 o1.w, c3, v0
    mad o0.xy, v2, c4, c4.zwzw
    mov o2, v1

// approximately 6 instruction slots used
